6AD9F4754F1F73F914F470BC00EE3B5D: Cryokinesis upgrade: Increased speed when using Cryokinesis.
349D0BCD452C288A96A68FBF90CB33BE: Cryokinesis upgrade: Knockback immunity and reduced incoming damage when using Cryokinesis.

E422F1364B6CDEA22A16E59138269135:
Ninjas Mastery includes crafting recipes for <Research>Ninja Scroll</> and <Research>Focus</> items, as well as <Research>Passive Effects</>.

Use your collected Essence to Learn an item, then fulfill requirements to Unlock it!  Unlocked recipes can be crafted at the <Research>TBD</>, which can be discovered by TBD and then built from the <Research>Build Menu</>.

Once Unlocked, <Research>Passive Effects</> will automatically be applied to specified items as long as they meet the rarity requirements of the Effects.
D3A6944D4D6864CB95E55CAF7EA77DC9: Power Surge upgrade: Drains charge more slowly, allowing you to zap through multiple enemies.
4E013C5F4676E3E6A50E43A5396C1CC4: Power Surge upgrade: Overload your powers, dealing damage in a wider radius.
25D10E904A79455EF0E44F8F5F5BDDED: Razor-sharp throwing stars favored by the ninja.
BEDE521E420C4DF538E0ECAD045FB642: Tecto-tunneling upgrade: Causes tremors, dealing Elemental Earth damage to any enemies above.
F547DC2B4895DE5D148A5782E68B455D: Tecto-tunneling upgrade: You'll sometimes find patches of rich earth, granting items and increasing your shields.
36BF11CE4C90DA9B1250CDAD9B93E76A: Unlocks ability to harvest Dragon Opal with <ItemName>Tier 3 Pickaxes.</>
817293084AB1539E8C1682825EE93DFA: Unlocks ability to harvest Steel with <ItemName>Tier 2 Pickaxes.</>

92551E1F435AE5E23BBCB9973F0F4015: When a Lightning Spinjitzu Scroll is equipped, faster movement and attack speeds after defeating an enemy. Lasts for 60 seconds or until you take damage.
8CAF936E49A9D04D1C8BA783629FC8DE: When a Lightning Spinjitzu Scroll is equipped, you can power vehicles, and attached batteries won't be consumed.
